actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: A bill to limit the Secret Service protection furnished to major presidential candidates and certain other individuals to such candidates and individuals while they are in the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to limit Secret Service protection furnished to major presidential or vice presidential candidates and spouses to protection within the United States only.

titles.title: A bill to limit the Secret Service protection furnished to major presidential candidates and certain other individuals to such candidates and individuals while they are in the United States.
